tweets.author: Department of Government Efficiency
tweets.content: DOGE is looking for help from the general public! Please DM insight for reducing waste, fraud, and abuse, along with any helpful insights or awesome ideas, to the relevant DOGE affiliates (found on the Affiliates tab). For example, @DOGE_USDA, @DOGE_SSA, etc. We will add...

tweets.author: Department of Government Efficiency
tweets.content: Here is the Inspector General reporting this problem in 2008. The good news is that it is now actively being fixed.

tweets.author: Department of Government Efficiency
tweets.content: This article is maliciously misleading. While the database error is unfortunate, this has zero connection to @DOGE. This type of error unfortunately has occurred regularly (~500 times each month) for years. In the same way that dead people are marked as living, the reverse also. Here is the Inspector General reporting this problem in 2008. The good news is that it is now actively being fixed.
